title: MOVES-BTG Pactual names Guillermo Ortiz as Mexico chairman
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
NEW YORK, Oct 22 (IFR) - Brazilian investment bank BTG Pactual has appointed former Bank of Mexico governor Guillermo Ortiz as chairman of i...
